item.title: OpenAI rolls out ChatGPT for iPhone in landmark AI integration with Apple
item.description: Apple and OpenAI are partnering to bring ChatGPT to iPhone, transforming Siri, camera and productivity features in iOS 18.2.

item.title: Midjourney is launching a multiplayer collaborative worldbuilding tool called ‘Patchwork’
